content.rendered:
The U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) hosts a virtual Town Hall series for SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) test developers and now includes information about monkeypox test development.

Additional information, Zoom invite details, and recordings of previous sessions can be found here:

  • https://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/workshops-conferences-medical-devices/virtual-town-hall-series-test-development-and-validation-during-public-health-emergencies-covid-19

 

Upcoming dates:

All Town Halls take place from 12:05pm – 1:00pm Eastern Time

  • October 5, 2022: Town Hall #94 Monkeypox
  • October 12, 2022: Town Hall #95 Monkeypox
